All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<TableDataRequestListener>, java.util.Collection<TableDataRequestListener>, java.util.List<TableDataRequestListener>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class TableDataRequestListenerCollection
extends java.util.ArrayList<TableDataRequestListener>

A helper class for implementers of the SourceTableDataRequestEvents interface. This subclass of ArrayList assumes that all objects added to it will be of type TableDataRequestListener.

See Also:

public void fireRequestData(int firstRow,

Fired when the source requests data.

Parameters:
firstRow - the start row of the request
